game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that an ancient artifact is buried within a forgotten ruin deep in the forest. Your quest is to locate and retrieve it, but be careful, the guardians of the artifact are said to be fiercely protective.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and legendary title "The Relic Hunter"

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You must find the hidden entrance in the heart of the forest, marked by an ancient tree with a carved symbol.
A powerful spirit guards the artifact. You must defeat it to proceed.
